description: This file defines a class AppTheme that centralizes the theming configuration for a Flutter application using Material 3 design principles. It specifies a color palette and sets up a Light theme with various UI component styles.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class providing a static method to generate a customized ThemeData object with specific color schemes and UI styles for the application.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: A static getter returning a ThemeData object configured with a light color scheme, using Material 3, including styles for app bar, floating action button, bottom navigation bar, cards, input decoration, and text themes.
